attributes.action: Investigate why Co Durham has lost so many Manufacturing Jobs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Town like Spennymoor Co Durham has lost Thousands of Manufacturing Jobs during the past decade. Mainly to Esatern Europe and Far East Economies.

This has had a dramatic affect on Local Shops and Pubs, due to reduced incomes and family budgets. Many families are also hit by large Council Taxes and Domestic Fuel Charges within Co Durham.

I would ask the PM to carry out an investigation within SW Durham regarding re building our Manufacturing base. I would ask that he directs extra Industrial Grants to boost our local economy and to help the younger potential workers gain employment.

     Many thanks,

       Ben Ord
